item.title: Gliding through Narnia on skis
item.description: Here are a fraction of photos from a recent trip to Keystone and Breckenridge. Pictures contain Kevin, Jimmy, Lauren, Kevin (best friends).

item.title: What the f*** is docker
item.description: Docker is a saint. That’s what it is. 1. Install Docker sudo apt install docker.io If you don’t have sudo access or apt package manager, find another tutorial. Warning Writing in progress.

item.title: What the f*** is conda
item.description: Conda is a bitch. That’s what it is. Nonetheless, we can make it do things you want. Install conda. Don’t install anaconda unless you are also a bitch. Install miniconda. Pick Linux > Miniconda3 Linux 64-bit unless, like I said, you are a little baby. Say yes to conda init. Fix default things that conda does Close your terminal and open another, or source ~.bashrc or wherever you have bashrc.

item.title: April Gigs Bring May Flowers
item.description: Thanks to Zenas, one of my best friends, for offering me a few gigs in April. Life-long memories. Thanks to the boys for being welcoming. Left to right: Andrew, Dev, Zenas, Reggie, Jared.

item.title: UofSC Announces Presidential Fellows for 2021-2022
item.description: The Graduate School is pleased to announce the University of South Carolina’s 2021-2022 Presidential Fellows. The Presidential Fellowship is UofSCâ€™s most prestigious university-wide award for promise of excellence at the graduate level. Presidential Fellows are exemplary scholars and leaders on campus. Unique among peer institutions for its reach across disciplines and focus on professional development, the Presidential Fellowship awards supplemental stipends totaling up to $32,000 for doctoral students (awarded over 4 years) and $20,000 for MFA students (awarded over 5 semesters).

item.title: About
item.description: My middle name is Kenneth. I drink coffee every morning. I am a deep thinker. I am trying to be a better person every time the sun comes up. I live in Columbia, SC.
